workflows.name: Text to Image (Illustrious Characters)

replace.prefix: score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, source_anime, high res image, masterpiece, best quality, very aesthetic, absurdres

workflows.describePrompt: Write only a detailed comma-delimited list of keywords and phrases to describe the character. The list must include all of the following items in this order: species and race, gender, age, facial features and expressions, occupation, hair and hair accessories (if any), what they are wearing on their upper body (if anything). Include only descriptions of visual qualities and anything which could seen in a still photograph. Ignore qualities such as personality, scents, and other non-visual traits. Use a single set of keywords or phrase to describe the background. Be concise. All parts of the keywords and phrases must be in lowercase. only with the list of keywords and phrases, do not include any other text.
workflows.namePromptPrefix: Write only one short, catchy name for the character based on the description given. The name must be three words or less, and must not include any special characters or punctuation. The name must be in title case. The name is:
